dim_eq:

-- TODO: generalize to `X : Type v`
theorem dim_eq {K : Type u} {X : Type max u v} [Field K] : module.rank K (free_algebra K X) = cardinal.mk (list X) :=
  (cardinal.lift_inj.mp (basis_free_monoid K X).mk_eq_dim).symm
#align dim_eq dim_eq
